description:
go.exp: creation of subrepository.
The subrepo is created; this CL is just the README to establish the subrepo.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.exp

LGTM.

Just curious, will future packages in exp/ be developed under this go.exp
sub-repository
or we just periodically synchronize known good packages from the exp
directory of the
main repository to this sub-repository?

I would hope they would be developed here, but I believe the policy
will evolve as we try it out.

-rob

LGTM

https://codereview.appspot.com/7459043/diff/1/README
File README (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/7459043/diff/1/README#newcode15
README:15: compatibility promise. Caveat emptor.

(To be clear, no subrepositories are subject to the Go 1 promise.)

An excellent suggestion. I don't know the magic to ensure this sub
repo gets on the dashboard, but if the spell could be invoked that
would be great.

Cheers

Dave

On Sat, Mar 2, 2013 at 9:19 AM,  <rsc@golang.org> wrote:
> LGTM
>
>
>
> https://codereview.appspot.com/7459043/diff/1/README
> File README (right):
>
> https://codereview.appspot.com/7459043/diff/1/README#newcode15
> README:15: compatibility promise. Caveat emptor.
>
> (To be clear, no subrepositories are subject to the Go 1 promise.)
>
> https://codereview.appspot.com/7459043/
>
> --
>
> ---You received this message because you are subscribed to the Google Groups
> "golang-dev" group.
>
> To unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an
> email to golang-dev+unsubscribe@googlegroups.com.
> For more options, visit https://groups.google.com/groups/opt_out.
>
>

On Sat, Mar 2, 2013 at 6:22 AM, Dave Cheney <dave@cheney.net> wrote:

> An excellent suggestion. I don't know the magic to ensure this sub
> repo gets on the dashboard, but if the spell could be invoked that
> would be great
>
seems we just need to modify slice subRepos in
$GOROOT/misc/dashboard/app/build/init.go
and re-deploy the builder dashboard.

btw, should the go.talks sub-repository be added? as there is one package
there (with tests).

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=c7d5f75d7150&repo=exp ***

go.exp: creation of subrepository.
The subrepo is created; this CL is just the README to establish the subrepo.

R=golang-dev, minux.ma, rsc, dave
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7459043

subject: code review 7459043: go.exp: creation of subrepository.
